snippet: The breadth of the demonstrations, which affected scores of cities, reflected widespread unhappiness with worsening economic prospects in Europe.
abstract: Workers across Europe mount coordinated protests against government austerity policies in time of economic malaise; breadth of general strikes reflects widespread unhappiness with high unemployment, slowing growth and worsening prospects in Europe, and resistance the European governments confront as they push plans for more belt tightening.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Elisabetta Povoledo and Gaia Pianigiani from Rome; Nicola Clark from Paris; Dan Bilefsky from Barcelona, Spain; and Niki Kitsantonis from Athens.

lead_paragraph: The breadth of the demonstrations, which affected scores of cities, reflected widespread unhappiness with worsening economic prospects in Europe.

headline.seo: European Workers Strike Over Austerity Measures
